thread.title: Jo and Kev
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Jo and Kev

author: Jo and Kev
title: Jo and Kev
text: We had a wonderful experience in Harvey Norman in Limerick (City East Retail Park, Ballysimon Rd). We had the full attention of the sales assistant, Meaghan, who was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. We were very happy with our purchases and will be back - recommended to all!
